1422050.name: UOS Prototype
1422050.description:
This is a prototype of future Virtual Machine with its own revolutionary UI paradigm, deep P2P utilization and other unique features

This is not 3D desktop
This is not Beta and even Alpha - this is a prototype

UOS Prototype gives you an opportunity to touch the future of UI by providing a new visual experience that has come as a fusion of major benefits of today's UI technologies and network nature of the Web with opportunities that modern and future devices bring. It is capable to adapt a single platform-independent virtual UI to a desktop, mobile and VR environments.

It currently supports Desktop mode and also provides Mobile and VR emulation modes.

This application is at a prototype stage - not Beta and even not Alpha and currently is under heavy research and development.

Evolved from the Aximion project.
